Text: WARNING: The Wild Tangent manager file contains a trojan horse! However, an average spyware or antivirus program should be able to get rid of it. Otherwise, this torrent is all good.

CrownVictoriaCop is correct. My AV found adware in the  manager file. But, it got rid of it and the download was fast! 145 kb/s. I normally get like 35 kb/s from these kinds of torrents. Good Post (except for the virus!!)
